content: Great article! Based on the read, I believe you will be an exceptional developer. In my experience people with a hunger for knowledge and growth excel in the field. It is a great profession for those who love to learn. I dropped out of college and worked at my father’s laundromat. Not content to clean clothes forever, I applied for every programming job I could until one gave me a chance, and now I’ve been a professional developer for 14 years. Never let anyone tell you that you can’t. Never let anyone tell you that you aren’t a “real developer.” I believe encouraging diversity on a team produces excellent solutions, and I am very excited that you have shared your experiences with us. Good luck!
